content.question: The x axis ranges from negative 7 to 7 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 5 to 5 in increments of 1. The relationship is composed of five plotted points connected by line segments. Moving from left to right: The first segment begins at (negative 6 comma negative 3), crosses the x axis at (negative 5 comma 0), and continues to the point (negative 4 comma 3). The second segment begins where the first ends and continues to (0 comma 3). The third segment begins where the second ends, goes down to cross the x axis at approximately (0.8 comma 0) and continues to the point (2 comma negative 4). The fourth segment begins where the third ends and goes up to cross the x axis at approximately (3.7 comma 0) and continues to the point (5 comma 3). ​The graph of the function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is shown. Over which of the following intervals is <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> increasing?

choices.label: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 6 comma negative 4 close square brackets"> <mfenced close="]" open="["> <mrow> <mo>-</mo> <mn>6</mn> <mo>,</mo> <mo>-</mo> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> </mfenced> </math> and <math alttext="open square brackets 2 comma 5 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open square brackets negative 6 comma 0 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open square brackets 2 comma 5 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 6 comma negative 4 close square brackets"> <mfenced close="]" open="["> <mrow> <mo>-</mo> <mn>6</mn> <mo>,</mo> <mo>-</mo> <mn>4</mn> </mrow> </mfenced> </math> and <math alttext="open square brackets 2 comma 5 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
